content.rendered:
Pearl Residences, Pearl View Estate, Enugu

The 4 Bedroom Semi-Detached Duplex is located within Pearl View Estate, Enugu, an exclusively serviced estate in the heart of Enugu, Nigeria’s coal city. The estate is a private collection of upscale contemporary terrace residences and duplexes.

The four-bedroom semi-detached duplexes are ideal for a large family. They have a living room, dining room, en-suite guest room, laundry room, pantry, private lounge, box room, master bedroom with walk-in closet, entrance porch, visitors’ toilet, and all rooms are en-suite.

The building also includes an attached Boys Quarter.

Title: Certificate of Occupancy

Neighborhood:

  • Akanu Ibiam International Airport
  • Caritas University
  • Emenite Aluminium Company

Residence Facilities:

  • Well paved external areas with exotic Horticulture
  • Standby Generator o Security and Intercom System
  • Spacious Individual Parking Space
  • Estate Management Service
  • Waste Disposal Unit o Central water treatment plant
  • Central security system

Price:

  • Outright: ₦43,697,135.20
  • 12 Months: ₦48,286,848 (Initial deposit of ₦7.2 Million)
  • 18 Months: ₦53,115,532.80 (Initial deposit of ₦14.4 Million)
  • 24 Months: ₦58,427,086.80 (Initial deposit of ₦17.28 Million)

Pearl Residence Subscription Form

1 file(s) 1.38 MB
Download
